name: Black Out (Pirate) [V.1]
description:
(CLICK GREEN FLAX 2X BEFORE PLAYING)

Controls (scroll down): 

WASD // Arrow Keys    =   Movement Controls

MouseButton1 // Space   =   Punch

[E]  =  Pistol

[R]  =  Gatling Gun

[G]  =  Smash

                                

                                  Objective: 

Defend yourself from as many Robots as possible, and stop them without dying!
